title: Performancing Test
author: VD
content_html: I’m just checking out this in-browser blog editor for Firefox.  I think I like it so far, it’s kind of nice to be able to blog at a moment’s notice when you’re at a web site.  I wouldn’t say it’s majorly life-enhancing like a Treo or anything, but I may well switch to blogging this way.
content_text:
I’m just checking out
this in-browser blog editor
for Firefox.  I think I like it so far, it’s kind of nice to be able to blog at a moment’s notice when you’re at a web site.  I wouldn’t say it’s majorly life-enhancing like a Treo or anything, but I may well switch to blogging this way.
